subject: J2EEUnit 0.6 is out
msgSnippet: J2EEUnit 0.6 is available for download at the new J2EEUnit web site (http://j2eeunit.sourceforge.net). The lists of changes and new features are available
messageBody:
J2EEUnit 0.6 is available for download at the new J2EEUnit web site
(http://j2eeunit.sourceforge.net).

The lists of changes and new features are available online on the
J2EEUnit web site.

Thanks.
Vincent Massol.

P.S.: For newcomers, J2EEUnit is a Testing framework for unit testing
server-side java code (i.e. some code called by a Servlet or JSP that
need valid HTTP request, HTTP response and HTTP session objects). It
is an extension to the JUnit testing framework.
